title: By the King, a proclamation concerning the act for the revenue on fire-hearths and stoves
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Hampton-Court, this 9th day of June 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
